definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Had he got up little earlier, he would not have missed the train.
sentences.chinese: 要是他早一點起身的話，他本來可以不誤車的。

sentences.english: If you don't hurry, you must miss the train.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不快點，你必然要誤車。

sentences.english: Fortunately we didn't miss the bus.
If we had started earlier, we should not have missed the train.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們早一點動身的話，就不會誤車了。

sentences.english: We missed the train because you dragged your feet.
sentences.chinese: 就因爲你總是拖拖拉拉的，我們纔會誤車。

sentences.english: The bus company announced that the fog would delay certain routes.
sentences.chinese: 公交公司已經發出通知，大霧將造成部分線路誤車。
